Modding Community.name: Randomizer
Modding Community.desc: Warp to a random checkpoint on various triggers (cells, flies, orbs, eco, death).

Modding Community.name: Local Multiplayer (beta) + Randomizer
Modding Community.desc: Shared-screen multiplayer, with Randomizer options available. L1+L2+R1+R2 on additional controllers to join.

Speedrun Practice.name: Speedrun practice mod
Speedrun Practice.desc: Extra speedrun trick checkpoints. Custom checkpoints: L2 + down to set / L2 + up to respawn

HimHam.name: Jak1 but every power cell he gets faster
HimHam.desc: Jak1 but every power cell he gets faster

ZedB0T.name: First Person Mode
ZedB0T.desc: Play the whole game from Jak's POV.

ZedB0T.name: Classic+
ZedB0T.desc: Mimicks PS2 speedrun behavior with some openGOAL QoL improvements.

ZedB0T.name: Randomizer
ZedB0T.desc: Warp to a random checkpoint on various triggers (cells, flies, orbs, eco, death).

ZedB0T.name: The FlutFlut Legacy
ZedB0T.desc: Play the whole game on FlutFlut.

ZedB0T.name: Ice Everywhere
ZedB0T.desc: Slippery ice physics on all surfaces.

Barg.name: Orb Hunt
Barg.desc: Jak 1 but everything is all moved around! More info on the GitHub page

Barg.name: Randomizer
Barg.desc: Warp to a random checkpoint on various triggers (cells, flies, orbs, eco, death).

Barg.name: Local Multiplayer (beta) + Randomizer
Barg.desc: Shared-screen multiplayer, with Randomizer options available.

Barg.name: The FlutFlut Legacy + Randomizer
Barg.desc: Play the whole game on FlutFlut, with Randomizer options available.

Barg.name: The Zoomer Legacy
Barg.desc: Play the whole game on the Zoomer, with various changes to better explore the entire game.

Barg.name: The SM64 Legacy
Barg.desc: Plays similar to Super Mario 64 (stars->cells, red coins->scout flies, coins->orbs)

Xyphles.name: Jak and Daxter But Every Time He Grabs An Orb He Grows
Xyphles.desc: Jak and Daxter But Every Time He Grabs An Orb He Grows.

InnocentMiau.name: Snowy Legacy
InnocentMiau.desc: Snowy texture pack and snowy weather everywhere.

MortisDG.name: Mystery Word V2
MortisDG.desc: If you say a certain word the game resets itself (requires 'VoiceAttack')

In Development.name: New Eco type
In Development.desc: Adds new unfinished pink eco, this is a new type NOT an overwrite

Yopie.name: OpenGhosts
Yopie.desc: Record and playback Jak's position. Saves to a file so you can share with your friends!

Kuitar.name: The Forgotten Lands
Kuitar.desc: Kuitar's first level. Just start a normal game at Geyser Rock. This is a work in progress and not fully finished yet.
